biotools.summary: PharmaMind®-MolMiner is a rule-free OCSR (Optical Chemical Structure Recognition) learning system. It aims to transform the vectorization problem into object detection tasks. That means it is able to extract chemical elements in an object detection manner by training well-labelled datasets with atom and bond annotations.

bioschemas.name: MolMiner
